name: Game Dev Studio
description: Welcome to your own Game Dev Studio! How will you run your own offices and ascend to greatness in the gaming industry?
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP SP3 Processor: Dual core @ 2GHz Memory: 1 GB RAM Graphics: 128 MB VRAM DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 150 MB available space
recommended_requirements: Processor: Quad core @ 2GHz Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: 256 MB VRAM DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 150 MB available space
